description:
This course is designed to be an OVERVIEW of both the QuickBooks Software and also an overview of basic bookkeeping and accounting skills. It is also desighned to be the clearest possible explanation of what QuickBooks is and how it is used. This course really is designed for people who consider themselves "slow learners" and have no background in Bookkeeping or computers. It has been helpful for students who are still learning English.

This course will show you how to use Quickbooks for a small CASH company. That's a small business that always pays immediately for what they need and always gets paid immediatly from their customers. This is common for "convinience store, 99 cent stores or any store that uses a cash register and never needs to keep records of the inventory that they sell. The DO NOT HAVE: sales tax, employees, receivables or payables (they don't do busimess on credit).
title: Kindergarten Quickbooks
